name: The Crow's Eye
description: Set against a backdrop of psychological terror, The Crowâ€™s Eye is a first-person puzzle adventure in which you will use your wits to escape the abandoned Medical University of Crowswood, while investigating the mysterious disappearances of students and faculty 20 years earlier.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher (32-bit or higher) Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher (32-bit or higher) Processor: Intel Core i5 or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
